Product Description: If you feel all backpacks are just the same old boring black and grey bags, read on. Especially if you are stylish and are looking for one that will complement your style. This handcrafted uppercase RollTop Laptop Backpack is the perfect stylish, sleek, and sturdy yet lightweight laptop backpack. It is large enough to hold a 15" laptop and leave you more than enough space to pack your other essentials. It is visually striking with a classic European design. Whether you are a college student or a working professional, this is the ideal everyday backpack. Designed with care - Spacious compartment that can carry 3+ A4-sized books or a set of clothes, and all your essential chargers and electronics. - Internal organiser to store your power bank and cables. - Front access pocket to easily carry important small items. - Bottle holder on the side. - Convenient trolley sleeve on the back allows it to be securely placed on a trolley for longer journeys. - Superior material quality - Premium Nylon-sheen fabric gives the backpack a smooth and glossy feel that is a joy to touch. - Air mesh on the back optimises breathability and regulates temperature while you wear the backpack. Designed for good - A promise of sustainable and ethical production uppercase is committed to partnering with you in building a world more beautiful. All our products are made from sustainable materials and are GRS (Global Recycle Standard) certified. Our manufacturing processes conform to the highest and most stringent GRS criteria. We ensure fixed working hours, minimum wages, and no child labour. We maintain strict standards in factory safety, energy management, and waste disposal management. We do not use any restricted or harmful chemicals. Every Roll Top Laptop Backpack bought helps reduce 9 1-litre plastic bottles from the planet, helps conserve 117ml of crude oil, and prevents 584g of CO₂ emission. * *Approximate calculations based on information available on www.textilevaluechain.in
